"Content Shared with [PSO2]":
"Registered fashion items and Lobby Actions, AC, SG, weapons and armor (Units) from [PSO2] can be used in [PSO2: NGS].

※When used in [PSO2: NGS], weapons and armor will have their performance converted to [PSO2: NGS] standards. For details on this conversion, see the ARKS-Visiphone wiki."

"To return from [PSO2: NGS] to [PSO2], use the \"Move Block\" function of any Ryuker Device and select \"[PSO2] Block\".

After returning to a [PSO2] Block, you can enjoy classic [PSO2] content, without losing access to those shared elements."

"In [PSO2] Blocks, you can enjoy all sorts of content, including a wide variety of Quests, the Casino, fighting other players in the Battle Arena, and your personal My Room.

※[PSO2]-related character advancement and equipment
\u3000enhancement can only be performed in [PSO2] Blocks."
